techmeme.title: YouTube expands its existing parental controls to let parents link their account to their teens' account and gain insight into the teens' activity (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
An analysis of OpenAI's GPT Store finds 100+ custom GPTs that appear to violate OpenAI's policies regarding sexual content, legal and medical advice, and more (Todd Feathers/Gizmodo)
The nonprofit Cosmos Institute launches to cultivate AI technologists "equipped with deep philosophical thinking", with plans for an AI lab, a VC arm, and more (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Indian bike taxi startup Rapido raised $200M at a $1.1B valuation led by WestBridge and plans to expand its newly launched cab-hailing service (The Economic Times)
Seattle-based Revefi, which seeks to automatically detect and troubleshoot companies' data-related issues, raised a $20M Series A led by Icon Ventures (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
